definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Do you think China should play the role of an arbitrator in the dispute between India and Pakistan ?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲中方是否應該在印巴衝突中充當調解者的角色？

sentences.english: Between India and Pakistan also the transit fee issue has yet to be resolved.
sentences.chinese: 另外，印巴之間還沒有解決輸送費的問題。

sentences.english: We support the further improvement of India-Pakistan relations.
sentences.chinese: 我們支持印巴進一步改善關係。

sentences.english: The Kashmir issue is one left over from history between India and Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 關於克什米爾問題，這是印巴之間的歷史遺留問題。

sentences.english: The thaw in India-Pakistan trade ties is expected to bolster economic integration of the South Asian region.
sentences.chinese: 印巴貿易關係解凍預期會幫助南亞地區的經濟整合。

sentences.english: The Third Indo-Pakistani war has been influenced by Super Powers.
sentences.chinese: 第三次印巴戰爭的爆發，其背後有着深刻的大國背景。

sentences.english: But China, Russia, India and Brazil are moving up fast.
sentences.chinese: 但是中俄印巴已經追上來了。

sentences.english: But on india -pak borders and india-china borders enemy air defence is just a couple of hundreds of KM away.
sentences.chinese: 但是在印巴和印中邊境敵人的防空就在幾百公里外。

sentences.english: A UN-backed Line of Control separates them.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國監督的印巴實際控制線把兩國分隔開來。

sentences.english: Pressure is building up at the Indian-Pakistani border.
sentences.chinese: 印巴邊界的緊張局勢正在形成。

sentences.english: India and Pakistan in Chengdu disco to exotic to India bar.
sentences.chinese: 成都印巴的士高，來至印度異域風情的酒吧。

definition: Line of Actual Control (LAC), separating Indian-controlled territory from Chinese-controlled territory
